name: Galactic Journey
description:
Galactic Journey is a single-player game developed by a collaboration of the Games & Apps Development and the Global Design course of Universidade Europeia/IADE. 

Description

Board on a Galactic Journey where time is relative. The Master Clock is broken and Galaxy Cosmos is frozen, it's is in danger and you need to save it from its inevitable fate! Only fixing the Master Clock will return life to the Cosmos. 

E to talk to NPC's | Tab to open inventory | P to pause

*

*

Andreia Santos | Maria Almeida |Ana Rita Lamelas | Anna Cardoso
